Title: Wireless Network Improvements - Further Competition under Jisc Routing & Switching Framework - AWARD
Description:
Please note that this further competition is only open to suppliers appointed to Lots 1 and 6 of the Routing & Switching Services Framework, managed by Jisc Services Ltd.
      
      The University is pleased to invite you to tender for this requirement. Please ensure you register/log-in to In-Tend then download and carefully read all documents attached to this invitation. Please note that tender responses and all communications should be made via In-Tend. To download ITT documents, please stay logged in to In-Tend and go to My Tenders, click on View Details under the appropriate project description, click on ITT tab and click on Download.
